desc: High performance, boutique bass guitar dealer. Specializing in Alleva Coppolo basses both new and pre-owned. Official dealer of Alleva Coppolo basses.

layout.text:
The finest collection of handmade bass guitars anywhere on the internet. We stock and specialize in Alleva-Coppolo Classic Supreme Basses.  We are  the only dealer that takes NEW custom orders on Alleva-Coppolo Classic Supremes.
Contact us today.  We are here to help you!
